articles.content: Dinesh Karthik is currently putting in the hard yards in Mumbai under the guidance of friend and mentor Abhishek Nayar, focussed on sharpening his finishing skills in the T20 format. Not because the … [+4836 chars]

articles.title: The Women's Ashes 2022 All-round Ellyse Perry returns to form as Australia seal Ashes win | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The veteran all-rounder returned figures of 3 for 12 before scoring a 40 to help Australia to a 5-wicket win
articles.content:
Ellyse Perry returned the best figures in the match and top-scored in Australia's five-wicket win © Getty
